q9-1-hydrostatic.title: Hydrostatic Pressure (Q9.1)
q9-1-hydrostatic.description: P = P₀ + ρgh. Pressure increases with depth.

q9-6-barometer.title: Barometer Column (Q9.6)
q9-6-barometer.description: P_atm = ρgh. Wine needs taller column than mercury.

q9-7-ocean-pressure.title: Pressure at Ocean Depth (Q9.7)
q9-7-ocean-pressure.description: P = P₀ + ρgh at 3 km depth.
